response_text:
Looking at these historical letter images, I can extract the following information:

From the letterhead and content, I can see this is a business letter from Basler Rheinschiffahrt-Aktiengesellschaft (Basel Rhine Shipping Corporation).

The date is clearly visible at the top: "Basel, den 16. September 1927"

The letter is addressed to "Herrn Rupprecht, Hotelier" in "Rheinfelden"

The signature at the bottom appears to be from someone representing the shipping company, though the exact name is difficult to read clearly.
